---
title: "Alyssa Garcia"
---

Alyssa Garcia is a visual artist of Trinidadian and Dutch background currently based in Kitchener, Ontario. Her creative spirit is inspired by states of consciousness found in-between, the dreams connecting our subconscious minds and everyday reality. She enjoys created ethereal scenes exploring the mind's emotional states. Her dream is to empower others to find their voice through self-expression and creativity.
